trans-unit.source: The information you entered was saved successfully.

trans-unit.source: Your company information was saved successfully. It will be added to getlokal after it has been approved by an administrator.

trans-unit.source: Your username should contain only alphanumeric characters, dash, dot or underscore
trans-unit.target: Korisničko ime može sadržati samo alfanumeričke karaktere, srednju crtu, donju crtu i tačku. Razmak između karaktera ne može da postoji.

trans-unit.source: Please enter a valid email address. An activation link will be sent to this address.
trans-unit.target: Molimo unesite važeću email adresu. Aktivacioni link će biti poslat na ovu email adreseu.

trans-unit.source: The email and/or password are invalid

trans-unit.target: Polja oznacena sastar su obavezna

trans-unit.source: We just sent a confirmation request to the email address that you provided.

trans-unit.source: Please check your email and click on the link to activate your getlokal account!
trans-unit.target: Molimo provJerite svoj email i kliknite na link za aktivaciju Vašeg naloga!

trans-unit.source: If you don't see the message in your Inbox, please also check your Junk Mail folder.
trans-unit.target: Ukoliko ne vidite poruku u svom inbox, molimo provjerite u Junk folderu.

trans-unit.source: You have entered "%value%". The security check picture must contain %length% characters. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: Uneli ste "%value%". Slika za provjeru sigurnosti sadrži %length% karaktera. Molimo pokušajte ponovo.

trans-unit.source: The photo was submitted successfully and will be published after it has been approved by a moderator.
trans-unit.target: Fotografija je uspješno sačuvana i biće objavljena nakon odobrenja od strane administratora.

trans-unit.source: You cannot write a reply on behalf of your company before your account has been approved.
trans-unit.target: Ne možete pisati i odgovarati u ime svoje firme pre nego što se odobri Vaš nalog.

trans-unit.source: Please contact getlokal to clarify your Business Account status.
trans-unit.target: Molimo kontaktirajte getlokal kako biste definisali status svog poslovnog naloga .

trans-unit.source: Restaurants, cafes, bars, clubs, fitness clubs, shops and much, much more. With getlokal you will never have to guess how good the service is at the new bar or wonder about the food in the restaurant you are thinking of going to on Friday (or any other time).
trans-unit.target: Restorani, barovi, klubovi, fitnes klubovi, butici i još mnogo toga. Sa getlokal nikada nećete morati da se pitate koliko je usluga u novom baru dobra ili kakva je hrana u restoranu u koji želite da odete sledećeg vikenda.

trans-unit.source: getlokal.me! Everyone wins. Register and write a review.getlokal.me!
trans-unit.target: getlokal.me! Svi dobijaju. Registruj se i napiši ptreporuku. getlokal.me!

trans-unit.source: If you haven't received an activation email for your account we can resend it to you. If you can't see your activation email please check your 'Junk' mail folder as well.
trans-unit.target: Ukoliko niste dobili aktivacioni email za svoj nalog možemo Vam ga poslati ponovo! Ako ne možete da vidite svoj aktivacioni email molimo provjerite u svom 'Junk' folderu.

trans-unit.source: This session has expired. Please login again.
trans-unit.target: Sesija je istekla. Molimo prijavite se ponovo.

trans-unit.source:
Hi, hope you are OK!

Have you heard about getlokal.com? I am already a registered user and use the site often to read and write reviews about places, products and services in my town. Here you can find everything, from the best and most visited restaurants and bars to sports and fitness clubs, haridressers and builders.Click on the link below and check for yourself!

http://getlokal.com
trans-unit.target:
Zdravo, nadam se da ste dobro!

Da li ste culi za getlokal.me? Ja sam vec registrovan korisnik i koristim sajt getlokal.me za citanje i pisanje preporuka o firmama, mjestima, proizvodima i uslugama u svom gradu. Ovdje možete pronaci sve, od najboljih i najpopularnijih restorana i barova do sportskih i fitnes klubova, frizera i majstora. Kliknite na link ispod i provjerite sami!

http://getlokal.me
Molimo unesite proizvod ili naziv firme

trans-unit.source: I hereby agree to observe the getlokal's Terms of Use
trans-unit.target: Saglasan sam da cu poštovati getlokal uslove korišcenja

trans-unit.source: Register on getlokal.com or log in your profile so you can write reviews, create events and become part of our user community.
trans-unit.target: Registrujte se na getlokal.me ili ulogujte se na svoj profil, kako biste mogli pisati preporuke, objavljivati dogažaje i postati deo zajednice korisnika

trans-unit.source: There is a Facebook Connect registration for this email address therefore we cannot generate a new password. To log in your user account click on the button. You will be logged in via your Facebook user account and password.
trans-unit.target: Za ovu email adresu vec postoji nalog povezan sa Facebook nalogom tako da ne možemo da generišemo novu lozinku. Kako biste se prijavili na svoj korisnocki nalog kliknite na link. Bicete prijavljeni putem svog Facebook naloga i lozinke

trans-unit.source: To create getlokal account click on the button. You will be logged in via your Facebook user account and password.
trans-unit.target: Da biste kreirali svoj getlokal nalog kliknite na link. Bicete prijavljeni putem svog Facebook naloga i lozinke

trans-unit.source: You don't have the required permission to access this page!

trans-unit.source: getlokal.me is created by the team behind Golden Pages
trans-unit.target: getlokal.me je kreiran od strane Yellow Pages tima

trans-unit.source: Thank you for providing information for company %s. This will help the getlokal.me team to approve your business account. In the meantime you could enter a brief description and working hours for your business. The access to your full company data with the option to edit it will be activated after your business account has been approved.
trans-unit.target: Hvala Vam što ste uneli podatke o firmi %s. Ovo će pomoći getlokal.me timu da odobri Vaš poslovni nalog. U međuvremenu, možete uneti opis i informacije o radnom vremenu Vaše firme. Pristup Vašem poslovnom nalogu kako biste ga mogli u potpunosti personalizovati i uređivati ćete dobiti čim nalog bude odobren.

trans-unit.target: Ne možeš da pronađeš firmu koju tražiš?

trans-unit.source: A voucher cannot be issued as you have already ordered the maximum vouchers per person for this offer.

promijene u ponudi su uspješno sačuvane.

trans-unit.source: The place you suggested was added to getlokal. It will be checked by a member of the getlokal team to ensure we have the right details. Meanwhile continue playing! Every new place you add increase your chances to win brand new SUPRA sneakers and the New iPad!
trans-unit.target: Mjesto koje ste predložili je uneto na getlokal. Neko iz getlokal tima će provjeriti informacije kako bismo bili sigurni da su svi detalji tačni. U međuvremenu nastavite da se igrate. Svako novo mjesto koje dodate povećava šansu da osvojite nove Supra patike i novi iPad!

trans-unit.source: The place you suggested was added to getlokal. It will be checked by a member of the getlokal team to ensure we have the right details and you will receive a confirmation email once it has been verified. Meanwhile, you can still write reviews, publish photos or create events about this place.
trans-unit.target: Mjesto koje ste predložili je uneto na getlokal. Neko iz getlokal tima će provjeriti informacije kako bismo bili sigurni da su svi detalji tačni i dobićete email obaveštenje kada se podaci verifikuju. U međuvremenu možete i dalje pisati preporuke, objavljivati fotografije ili događaje u vezi sa ovim mjestom.

trans-unit.source: In order to protect the information associated with your business we have introduced some additional security requirements.
trans-unit.target: U cilju zaštite informacija u vezi Vaše firme uveli smo dodatne sigurnosne mere.

trans-unit.source: Use these login details every time you want to view or edit the information about the places you manage.

trans-unit.target: Možeš dobiti zanimljive informacije o mjestima i događajima u tvojoj blizini

trans-unit.source: You have the opportunity to win fab prizes by participating in getlokal promotions

trans-unit.target: Ukoliko želite da napustite getlokal zajednicu, sve vaše preporuke, fotografije, događaje i liste biće izbrisane!

trans-unit.source: Proceed to deletion of your getlokal account
Here are three good reasons to keep your account:
trans-unit.target: Ovo su tri dobra razloga da zardžiš svoj nalog:

trans-unit.source: Still want to delete your profile?
trans-unit.target: I dalje želite da obrišete svoj nalog?

trans-unit.source: We can't send you a new password because your profile hasn't been activated yet. Click on 'Resend an activation mail' and follow the instructions there.

trans-unit.source: We can't send you a new activation email because your profile is already active.
trans-unit.target: Ne možemo Vam poslati novu lozinku jer je Vaš profil već aktivan.

trans-unit.source: We are sorry to see you go. We value all our users and would be grateful if you %s and let us know what we did wrong.
trans-unit.target: Žao nam je što odlazite. Poštujemo sve naše korisnike i voljeli bismo da %s i date nam do znanja šta smo uradili pogrešno.

trans-unit.source: See info for all %s in %s - addresses, telephones, working hours, descriptions and images. Reviews and comments from clients. Find the best %s in %s.
trans-unit.target: Pogledajte informacije za sve %s u %s - adrese, telefoni, radno vrijeme, opisi i fotografije. Preporuke i komentari klijenata. Pronađite najbolje %s u %s

trans-unit.source: Meet Rumi, our getWeekend Girl. Every week Rumi sorts through all the different events and selects the best concerts, parties, art exhibitions, festivals, sports, and fashion activities so you can plan the perfect weekend.
trans-unit.target: Upoznajte Rumi, našu getWeekend Devojku. Svake nedelje Rumi pregleda različite događaje i odabira najbolje koncerte, žurke, umetničke performanse, festivale, sportove i modna dešavanja kako bi vam pomogla u planiranju savršenog vikenda!

trans-unit.source: getWeekend is a production from getlokal –Bulgaria's most exciting website for recommendations and reviews. You can see us online at any time /youtube & facebook/ and live on Travel TV, Travel HD, and Community TV
trans-unit.target: getWeekend je deo getlokal.com – Bugarskog najuzbudljivijeg sajta za preporuke i recenzije. Možete nas pratiti onlajn /youtube & facebook/ i uživo na Travel TV, Travel HD, Community TV

trans-unit.source: The place you suggested was added to getlokal. It will be checked by a member of the getlokal team to ensure we have the right details and you will receive a confirmation email once it has been verified.
trans-unit.target: Mjesto/firma koju ste predložili je dodata na getlokal. Član getlokal tima će je provjeriti kako bi se uverio da ste uneli sve tačne detalje pa ćete dobiti potvrdu putem emaila.

trans-unit.source: If you want to add %s, please log into your getlokal profile.
trans-unit.target: Ako želiš da dodaš %s moraš da se uloguješ.

trans-unit.source: You need to log in with a user profile and not as a place admin in order to finish what you started.
trans-unit.target: Morate se prijaviti preko korisničkog naloga a ne kao administrator mjesta/firme kako biste završili započeto.

trans-unit.source: We couldn't find a place beginning with:
trans-unit.target: Nismo pronašli mjesto/firmu koja počinje sa:

trans-unit.source: Sorry, the place you were looking for does no longer exist at this web address.
trans-unit.target: Mjesto/firma kojeu ste tražili više ne postoji na ovoj adresi.

trans-unit.source: You might find similar places if you browse through the places listed in getlokal!
trans-unit.target: Možete pronaći slična mjesta/firme na getlokal

trans-unit.source: On getlokal you can read recommendations written by people like you and write your own which will help you take more informed decisions! You can also make lists with useful places, add photos of places and win prizes in our campaigns!
trans-unit.target: Na getlokalu možete pročitati preporuke, pisane od strane ljudi poput Vas, i pisati svoje preporuke koje će Vam pomoći da uz više infomacija donosite odluke! Takođe, možete napraviti liste s korisnim mjestima, dodavati fotografije mjesta/firmi i osvojiti nagrade u našim kampanjama!

trans-unit.source: Hi %s and welcome back to getlokal. We have been busy improving the site since your last visit and making sure it’s better, faster and easier to use. One of the changes is to ‘Badges’ so that you can earn them when you write reviews, and publish photos and events. You might see that one of your previous badges has disappeared; this is because we had a small glitch in our system that was incorrectly awarding badges. But it’s all been fixed now so you can be sure that all badges you unlock from now on will stay on your profile.
trans-unit.target: Zdravo i dobrodošli na getlokal. Bili smo zauzeti poboljšanjem sajta od Vaše poslednje posjete da bi sajt bio bolji, brži i lakši za korišćenje. Jedna od promijena su Beževi koje možete zaraditi kada pišete preporuke, objavljujete fotografije i događaje. Možda ćete primetiti da je jedan od Vaših prethodnih bedževa nestao, to je zato što smo imali problem u sistemu koji je pogrešno dodelio bedž. Sve greške su ispravljene tako da možete biti sigurni da će svi bedževi otključavanja od sada ostati na Vašem profilu.

If you just want to grab this place details and show them on your blog or site, just customise the settings below and paste the code in your source file.
trans-unit.target: Ako želiš da preuzmeš detalje ovog profila i prikažeš ih na svom sajtu ili blogu, podesi parametre i kopiraj kod u svoj sors fajl.

trans-unit.source: Do you run a events related blog or website? You can take-away some fresh content from getlokal. Just customize the looks and content, grab the code and paste it in the source code where you want it to show.
trans-unit.target: Ako imaš sajt ili blog koji se bavi događajima i želiš da ga obogatiš sadržajem, možeš ga preuzeti sa našeg sajta. Podesi parametre, izgled i sadržaj koji želiš da preuzimaš i kopiraj kod u svoj sors fajl.

If you type in the address – street name and number - the position of the market showing where the place is will change. If the positioning doesn’t seem correct you can move the marker. This will not change the address you’ve already written.
Is this place easy to find? Add directions if necessary.
You can add up to 3 telephone numbers!

The correct format to use is 023456789 or for mobile phones 0888888888. Add only the local area code for landlines. Only add digits – any other characters or spaces between characters are not allowed.
You can add up to 5 classifications!
Start typing the place type e.g. ‘restaurant’ or ‘hairdressers’ and select the most appropriate category for the place you’re adding

Stretch the crop area to your preference. Note that the selection won't stretch over the limit of 975x300 px.
You can drag the selection to a different part of the photo.
Once you're ready, click on the CROP button. The cropped image will be saved as a new copy in Cover Photos Tab and set as a cover photo.
If the selected area is smaller than 975x300 px, your image will be centered on the cover photo template surrounded by a black background.

Getlokal is Bulgaria's best site for reviews and recommendations. Here you can find information about restaurants, clubs, bars, shops, entertainment, art, etc. You can also write and share events, read our blog and get useful info from our newsletter. To explore and use all getlokal functionalities you must be a register user. This gives you right to collect cool badges, upload place or profile photos and participate in various getlokal games for great prizes.

Looking for the best steak in town? The perfect coffee-house? The grooviest dancing place for a get together with your friends? Find what you seek and share what you think with getlokal.ro! This is the place page of our office in Bucharest - feel free to drop by anytime for a great espresso and a nice talk!

GetLokal is Macedonia's best site for reviews and recommendations. Here you can find information about restaurants, clubs, bars, shops, entertainment, art, etc. You can also write and share events, read our blog and get useful info from our newsletter. To explore and use all GetLokal functionalities you must be a register user. This gives you right to collect cool badges, upload place or profile photos and participate in various GetLokal games for great prizes.

To explore and use all getlokal functionalities you must be a register user. This gives you right to collect cool badges, upload place or profile photos and participate in various getlokal games for great prizes.

404 ERROR - The page can't be found
Here are some of the possible reasons
Did you type a URL i.e. website address?
You may have typed the website address (URL) incorrectly. Please, check the spelling, capitalization, punctuation, etc.
Did you follow a link to this page from another page in this site?
If you reached this page from another page in this site, please email us at info@getlokal.com so we can fix the problem.
Did you follow a link from another site?

Links from other sites can sometimes be out-of-date or misspelled. Please email us at info@getlokal.com with information about the site from which you followed the link so we can try and contact the other site in order to fix the problem.
If you reached this page from another page in this site, please email us at romania@getlokal.com so we can fix the problem.

Links from other sites can sometimes be out-of-date or misspelled. Please email us at romania@getlokal.com with information about the site from which you followed the link so we can try and contact the other site in order to fix the problem.

Of course, everything good comes with a little effort!
Access the app and choose your city.
If the chosen classifications are too many for your taste, just turn off some of them.
The app generates places in the chosen classification, in your city that you need to write reviews about.

Write reviews about places you know and in case you haven't been to one of those generated - click on [x] to refresh and load a new place. When you have completed writing 3 reviews, you will automatically win a chance to the weekly draw and also a chance to the big prize of the campaign!

You can write as many reviews as you like during a week - you will win more chances this way. The prizes may vary from a week to another so keep an eye on %s and don't miss out the %s to be informed about changes in the prizes and the winners annoucements!

The getlokal reviews are written by regular people, not professional text editors. We are relying on you authentic point of view and real experiences. We are checking every review and if we notice your content being copy-pasted from the web, you will loose all the chances acumulated by that point.

Write about everything you care about - as a consumer - did you like the music? was the service fast? what particulary detail would you recommend to a friend? is there something you didn't like in the bar, pub, restaurant or coffee shop?

Log in/Register to link the places you added with your account!
trans-unit.target: Uloguj se/Registruj se da bi dodata mesta bila linkovana sa tvojim nalogom!

trans-unit.source: Thank you! If the place is claimed, we will sent your suggestions to the owner. If not, we will manually verify and update the details of the place.
trans-unit.target: Hvala! Ako je prosfil preuzet od strane vlasnika, poslacemo mu predložene izmjene. Ako nije, administratori ce provjeriti informacije i objaviti izmene.

trans-unit.source: Planning a great night out looking for a recommended beauty salon, or a trendy bar - you will find everything you search in Getlokal
trans-unit.target: Planiraš izlazak i dobar provod, tražiš preporučeni salon ljepote ili popularni kafe bar - sve što tražiš pronaći ćeš na Getlokal

trans-unit.source: Concerts, exhibitions, parties – Getlokal will show you when and where local events are happening
trans-unit.target: Koncerti, izložbe, žurke - Getlokal će te obavijestiti gdje i kad se održavaju lokalni događaji
